reviewText: The show surpassed my expections upon viewing.  It is more interesting, at least to me, than most anime.  Great, intricate story line.

In this DVD things seem to get more real for Ed and Al. Ed finally becomes a State Alchemist, but once again he faces a huge tragic.

Fullmetal Alchemist is one of the most heartbreaking anime's you'll ever watch. I cry every time I watch this DVD.

I really recommend you get this, it is very good and one of the best anime's you'll probably ever watch.

--Misa Misa
